PersonalStatement.text: Daniel Mckenzie, born on 1979-12-31, is a Male based in North Derrickstad, Portugal. He is Divorced and holds Swiss nationality. Currently working at Holland Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Morgan Ltd from 2010 to 2019.
Senior Research Scientist at Holland Ltd, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Technical University of Denmark
Master's in Engineering from Indiana State University

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys photography.
